context_of_use: This use case allows users to update and maintain their personal profile information within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: user: wants to keep account details accurate
description: This use case enables users to update their profile information to ensure accuracy.
triggering_event: User initiates a request to update profile information.
preconditions: User is logged into the system.
User has valid profile information to update.
postconditions: User's profile information is updated successfully.
User receives confirmation of the update.
assumptions: User has access to the system and is authenticated.
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to update their profile information.
main_flow: 1. User requests to update profile information → System displays the profile update form.
2. User enters new profile information → System validates the input.
3. User submits the updated profile information → System updates the profile and confirms the update.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 2): If the input is invalid, then System displays an error message and prompts the user to correct the input.
information_for_steps: 1. User input data for profile update.
2. Validation results of the input data.
